Desc.entry: Advises on archaeological matters in the four South Yorkshire Districts. Holds the Sites and Monuments Records (SMR), which lists known archaeological sites. Events include South Yorkshire Archaeology Day in November. Also responsible for South Yorkshire Historic Environment characterisation website www.sytimescapes.org.uk, please see website for more information. Is a curatorial service and does not undertake fieldwork projects.

Pubs.entry: Archaeology in South Yorkshire, annual review

ContactName.entry: Dinah Saich, Principal Archaeologist/Louisa Matthews, Archaeological Records Officer

Telephone.entry: appointments for SMR, Archaeological Records Officer
